title: Restaurant Booking
transcript: Thank you for calling Mario's Restaurant. We are fully booked for dinner tonight, but we have tables available for lunch tomorrow between 12 and 2 PM. Our evening slots are available from Thursday onwards. We serve traditional Italian food, and our most popular dishes are the seafood pasta and chicken pizza. Please note that we don't accept credit cards, only cash or debit cards. To make a reservation, please provide your name and phone number.
